alert.note: Alert for Southern Westchester (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 27 at 3:46AM EST until February 28 at 1:00PM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 1 PM EST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow, sleet and rain expected. Total snow and accumulations of 3 to 5 inches expected, with locally up to 6 inches possible. * WHERE...In New Jersey, Eastern Bergen, Western Essex and Western Union Counties. In New York, Southern Westchester County. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 1 PM EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Check local Department of Transportation information services for the latest road conditions.
